Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Sacremento
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kedzie, Ogden, California and Roosevelt due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Sacremento

How does this affect my trip?
